metadata.title: CVE-2023-6931 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - high
metadata.description: A heap out-of-bounds write vulnerability in the Linux kernel's PerformanceEvents system component can be exploited to achieve local privilegeescalation. A perf_event's read_size can overflow, leading to an heapout-of-bounds increment or write in perf_read_group(). We recommendupgrading past commit 382c27f4ed28f803b1f1473ac2d8db0afc795a1b.

criterions.comment: linux: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
linux-lts-xenial: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
